snippet: The Vons Companies, Southern California's biggest supermarket chain, is acquiring 53 Builders Emporium leases in a shutout strategy against competitors. Builders Emporium is liquidating its 97 home-improvement stores, which are the same size as su...
lead_paragraph: The Vons Companies, Southern California's biggest supermarket chain, is acquiring 53 Builders Emporium leases in a shutout strategy against competitors. Builders Emporium is liquidating its 97 home-improvement stores, which are the same size as supermarkets. Analysts expect Vons to convert six or eight to markets and hold on to the others until commercial rents rebound -- then sell them. Financial terms of the deal were not disclosed.

headline.main: VONS BUYING LEASES OF 53 BUILDERS EMPORIUM STORES
